page.title: 04Bilborough-Trowell:Housing
page.content: In a survey of our area we found that 18% of people lived in detached houses,66% in semi-detached,8% in terraced,6% in bungalows and 2% lived in a flat.The majority of people in this area have got a garden.In fact 93% have.It seems that 71% of people have altered their houses.The most popular type of alterations were double glazing and central heating with 15% each.Next came extensions with 5%.Out of all the houses in our area 18% of people have had their kitchens changed and a further 9% have had alterations done to their bathrooms.Only 3% had found it necessary to repair their houses.One person we found had even had a swimming pool put in.
